column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm really not sure why!! If you like fake bacon bits on your salad and velveta cheese in place of cheese curds for the fried cheese appetizer
column2: then you may like this resturant. They are extremely slow
column3: so plan to spend the whole evening there . The waitress dropped the pan holder on the floor and and just picked it up and reused it
column4: with out cleaning it. If you want good Chicago style pizza
column5: skip this place and go to Giordano's. You'll be much happier
column6: and they'll feed you real foods
